author: neels
msg: Tweak and automate benchmark suite1 chart generation.
Add 'lastN' keyword, add --title option. Tweak chart arrangement. Simplify
* tools/dev/benchmarks/suite1/run: Add charts URL hint after disclaimer.

author: rgauss
msg: - Added an Embedder interface, similar to Parser, which defines getSupportedEmbedTypes and an embed method
- Added a base ExternalEmbedder implementation of the Embedder interface, similar to ExternalParser, which can call a command line executable, the default being sed, to perform embedding
- Added a base ExternalEmbedderTest which 'embeds' lines in a text file then uses a TXTParser to verify the expected embedded metadata exists

author: ffang
msg: [KARAF-1938]Lock logic should wait for start level change to occur

author: jgomes
msg: Add support for Mono 4.0.  Fix compiler warnings in unit tests.
